phone.subtitle: Track development
phone.watering: Water plants - last cycle 2 days ago

problem.title: The problem every grower faces
problem.subtitle: Never get lost in your grow again.
problem.description: In the rush of cultivation, taking notes and organizing everything takes time and costs harvest. Mybud listens to your voice, organizes by plant and delivers a visual plan so you know exactly what happened and what the next step is.

timeline.title: Plant timeline
timeline.description: Days, pot changes and stages aligned in an easy-to-review and repeat timeline.

voice.title: Voice recording
voice.description: Say what happened and the app creates notes, tasks and links with the right plant.

tasks.title: Tasks and reminders
tasks.description: Smart alerts remind you about watering, pruning, flushing and every care at the perfect timing.

stickers.title: Automatic stickers
stickers.description: Stickers with stage, day and QR to record evidence effortlessly.

features.title: Everything a grower needs to cultivate in command
features.subtitle: Mybud combines voice, smart tasks and a visual journal so you can execute your grow with confidence, repeat what worked and evolve batch after batch.

journal.title: Timeline showing what each plant experienced
journal.description: Days per stage, pot changes and multimedia records organized for you to replicate or adjust each round.

voice.title: Voice notes become complete records
voice.description: Hold the mic, tell what you did and let Mybud save doses, tasks and observations without touching the keyboard.

alerts.title: Task schedule that doesn't miss anything
alerts.description: 25+ ready templates, recurring routines and precise alerts to water, feed, train and inspect at the right time.

guides.title: Visual journal ready to show results
guides.description: Photos, videos and automatic stickers grouped by week and stage to compare before/after and share with pride.

appShowcase.title: Control your grow in three quick steps
appShowcase.subtitle: See how Mybud transforms your routine into actionable data without interfering with manual work.

step1.title: Capture everything in seconds
step1.desc: Tap the microphone or take a photo; the app identifies the plant and records the activity automatically.

step2.title: See the full plan
step2.desc: Stage-based timeline with day count, metrics and responsible parties shows what already happened and what's coming next.

step3.title: Execute at perfect timing
step3.desc: Smart alerts, checklists and QR codes make each task ready to complete at the right moment.

identityTrust.description: Mybud was born in a real grow: we got tired of messy spreadsheets, confusing dates and reminders that never fire. We built a smart journal that respects your privacy and follows the intense routine of those who cultivate.

private.title: Smart integration
private.desc: Ready to connect sensors, controllers and IoT as soon as you want to automate.

community.title: Community-built
community.desc: Evolves with each release with direct feedback from those who cultivate indoors and outdoors.

tested.title: Real-world tested
tested.desc: Running in real grows during beta to ensure nothing stays just theory.

demo.title: See the app running before you join.
demo.subtitle: Quick class (15 min) showing voice recording, plant timeline, reminders and checklists.
demo.afterWatching: Liked it? Join the free beta

associationsSection.title: Are you an association or have a collective grow?
associationsSection.subtitle: Mybud is software that scales with you.
associationsSection.description: We develop specific solutions for cannabis associations and small facilities that need professional management without unnecessary complexity.

management.title: Simplified management
management.desc: Organize members, growing areas or processes in a simple and intuitive platform. Total control without complication.

reports.title: Reports
reports.desc: Automatic reports for compliance, auditing and management. Organized data always updated for decision making.

traceability.title: Identification and traceability
traceability.desc: From plant to extraction, maintain complete traceability with unique codes and detailed history of each stage.

integration.title: Partner integration
integration.desc: Direct access to inputs, devices and validated schedules.

intelligence.title: Simplified compliance
intelligence.desc: Stay up to date with protocols and regulations through automated systems and intelligent alerts.

betaSignup.title: Secure your spot on Mybud before it opens

whatWeExpect.title: How to participate
whatWeExpect.useApp: Use the app a few minutes a day to record your real grow.
whatWeExpect.survey: Answer a quick biweekly form to share feedback.
whatWeExpect.call: Agree to a 15-min call when questions or new features arise.

whatYouGet.premium: Additional Premium months guaranteed at launch.

faq1.question: Is the app already in stores?
faq1.answer: Not yet. We're in closed beta. Those who join now get up to 6 months Premium.

faq2.question: Do I need to show my grow?
faq2.answer: No. You control everything. The data is anonymous.

faq3.question: How much will it cost later?
faq3.answer: Premium = R$ 30/month. Those who join the beta get free months.

footer.legalNotice: Mybud is an organization and recording tool. Respect local legislation.

voiceNotes.subtitle: The grow journal that understands your voice. No typing, no forms â€” just speak naturally and let Mybud organize.

natural.title: Understands natural language
natural.description: Say "Watered Blue Dream with 500 ml" and Mybud creates the activity with all details. No forms, no endless lists.

classification.title: Automatic activity classification
classification.description: Recognizes over 25 types of tasks from your speech: watering, training, transplanting, observations â€” everything categorized automatically.

context.title: Smart context
context.description: Knows which are your plants and what happened recently. Mybud fills in the details automatically, making everything instant.

timeSaver.title: Save +10 minutes per day
timeSaver.description: What took 5 minutes typing now takes 10 seconds speaking. More time growing, less time noting.

cta.text: Join growers who have already saved hours of manual recording

voiceNoteDemo.tryExample: Try saying: "Watered my plants with 500 ml"

plantTimeline.subtitle: Track the entire plant cycle with a visual timeline. Never lose track of what phase your grow is in.

automatic.title: Automatic time tracking
automatic.description: Days and weeks calculated for each stage. Know exactly how long the plant has been in veg or flower.

visual.title: Simple visual progress
visual.description: See the complete plant history in an interactive timeline. Compare previous cycles and replicate the best results.

predict.title: Harvest prediction
predict.description: Based on the current stage, Mybud estimates when you'll harvest. Plan drying, curing and storage in advance.

insights.title: Your personal
insights.altImage: Illustration of Budzinho, your grow partner
insights.subtitle: Meet Budzinho: the partner who has grown many plants and accompanies you from start to finish, bringing human support in every cycle.
insights.description: He combines practical experience with mybud intelligence to deliver personalized insights for your plants, phases and environment.
insights.contextDescription: Guidance considers plant phase, cultivation week, environmental metrics and recent activities. It's like having a master grower watching 24/7.

byStage.title: By stage
byStage.description: Different guidance for plants in vegetative or flowering

monitoring.title: Metrics monitoring
monitoring.description: Alerts when temperature, humidity or VPD fall outside ideal range

detection.title: Problem detection
detection.description: Identifies patterns indicating stress or nutrient deficiency

learning.title: Continuous learning
learning.description: Understand why metrics matter and best practices for each phase

step1.title: You record activities
step1.description: Record watering, metrics and observations by voice or manually

step2.title: The engine analyzes
step2.description: The engine evaluates stage, metrics and patterns based on 1000+ expert rules

step3.title: Get recommendations
step3.description: Receive practical insights at the right time for your grow

highTemp.message: Temperature above 32Â°C â€” increase ventilation to maintain vigor

week6.message: Week 6 of flowering â€” perfect time to check trichome development

vpd.message: VPD in ideal range (0.8-1.2) â€” excellent cultivation conditions

lst.message: Your vegetative plants are thriving! Consider LST to improve structure

seo.title: Mybud B2B â€” Product usage insights that validate and boost revenue.
seo.description: From daily cultivation to strategic decisions: Mybud puts your brand inside the grower routine and shows how real cultivators use your products through actionable metrics.
seo.ogImageAlt: Mybud interface showing product usage insights and recommendations.

hero.title1: Product usage insights that validate and drive sales.
hero.subtitle: From daily cultivation to strategic decisions, My Bud shows how growers use your products and transforms their routine into actionable performance metrics for nutrient brands, equipment manufacturers, and cannabis associations.
graphHighlights: Relevant content in real grow routines

problem.title: Cannabis marketing and operations are stuck.
problem.description: Restricted ads, shallow metrics, and manual reports keep brands from growing safely. Mybud changes the gameâ€”placing your brand in the grower routine and showing how cultivators actually use your products through real, ethical, traceable usage insights.

step1.title: Track real usage
step1.desc: Your protocol or feeding chart becomes an interactive schedule. Growers receive tasks; you track how they use your products through adherence, adoption, and repurchase metrics.

step2.title: Visible, useful usage
step2.desc: Your brand appears in logs, tasks, photos, and video stickersâ€”authorized social proof.

step3.title: Strategic influencers
step3.desc: Track coupons and real usage codes from public growers and measure funnel impact.

step4.title: Optional integrations
step4.desc: QR codes, connected packaging, and IoT send clients straight to your product schedule inside the app.

socialProof.title: More than metrics: social proof.
socialProof.description: Validate your protocols in collective grows or sponsor strategic influencer growers. By tracking how growers use your products, you produce solid cases, prove results, and strengthen your commercial portfolio.

validation.title: Relevant content in the real routine
validation.desc: Auditable journals, approved media, and live usage context by batch.

influencers.title: Strategic influencers
influencers.desc: Follow coupons, codes, and repurchase across verified growers.

cases.title: Faster commercial cases
cases.desc: Combine data plus storytelling to accelerate sales and partnerships.

socialProof.cta: Schedule a call and get an initial diagnostic.

faq.title: FAQ â€“ Quick answers
faq.subtitle: If you don't see your question here, let us know in the form.

q1.q: What usage insights do I receive?
q1.a: Product adoption rates, usage patterns, repurchase behavior, performance reports, and visual evidence of how growers use your products.

q2.a: In automated tasks, grow diary, stickers, and a live showcase.

q3.a: Yesâ€”schedules, spec sheets, and exclusive content.

q4.a: Yes, through UTMs, coupons, and repurchase reports.

q5.a: Yesâ€”category- and time-based exclusivity for founding agreements.
